title: 3 and Out - Darnold/Baker Battle, Rodgers Good Trip, Bills SB Pressure, Camp Overreactions, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Darnold/Baker Battle, Rodgers Good Trip, Bills SB Pressure, Camp Overreactions, Mailbag
description:
John explains why the Panthers camp QB battle between Sam Darnold and Baker Mayfield is already over, why Aaron Rodgers' highly criticized psychedelic off-season has him in a positive headspace heading into Week 1, why the Bills and Colts’; weak divisions are giving them a golden opportunity to make a title run, why Andy Reid’s “tree” beyond coaching reaches to all corners of the NFL - dwarfing Belichick’s, why highly publicized QB training camp struggles are overblown, and why the NCAA penalizing programs for pre-NIL violations is laughable. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always  FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
